Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Masculine figure
Description: Masculine figure roughly carved from the section of a branch. No limbs are represented in any detail other than the identical feet. The cranium is ovoid-shaped. At the level of the belly a traverse hole preserves the remains of a peg representing the phallus.
